rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with a North-facing entrance aligned to Vastu guidelines for prosperity and calm. Includes storage and coat closet.
Open space adjoining the entrance hall with a colonial style design featuring high ceilings and large windows to capture natural light. Ideal for family gatherings.
Functional kitchen equipped with modern appliances arranged in an L-shape layout ensuring efficiency while maintaining a colonial aesthetic.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen for casual meals with colonial styled wooden furniture and decor.
Multi-functional room that serves as an additional living area or guest bedroom, designed in a duplex layout providing privacy within the same floor.
Primary bathroom on ground floor ensuring convenience with colonial fixtures and natural stone finishes, aligned for proper Vastu energy flow.
Small area designated for laundry and storage with a colonial aesthetic preserving harmony in design.

openings.description: North-facing entrance providing optimal Vastu alignment for energy and auspiciousness.
Large colonial style windows with shutters to allow ample natural light while maintaining privacy.
Balcony door providing access to the internal courtyard and garden view, enhancing air circulation.
